text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_Visible
text.text: When enabled, the overlay is visible

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_TextSize
text.text: Font Size for display, in relative pixels.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_AlphaSort
text.text: When enabled, sort list alphebetically, otherwise, use the tab order.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowAll
text.text: When enabled, show all fields; otherwise, only show the fields not in exclude_fields list.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowUnowned
text.text: When enabled, show fields from farms you are not a part of.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowPlayer
text.text: When enabled, show the name of the player controlling a vehicle. Active in multiplayer games only.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowFieldFruit
text.text: When enabled, show the field crop's name.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowFieldFruitColor
text.text: When enabled, the field crop's color will used for its text color.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowFieldFruitGrowth
text.text: When enabled, show the field crop's growth state.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_ShowFieldFruitGrowthColor
text.text: When enabled, the field crop's growth state text will be colored accordingly.

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_PadFieldNum
text.text: When enabled, show the field number as at least 2 digits (1 -> 01)

text.name: toolTip_fieldInspector_TextBold
text.text: When enabled, use bold text throughout the display
